summary: Hamster Monogatari 64 is a life simulation game which the player raise and take care of a hamster which the hamster are placed in a cage. The player can give the hamster attention but if the player give the hamster lots of attention, the hamster will be determine what they become either a loveable one or a savage and maniac one. As the hamster grow up and evolve, they gain new abilities for the hamster competitions. Players can raise up to four hamsters which players can take care of them in a variety of ways.

name: Hanasaki Work Spring!
summary:
In the midst of spring, the season of first encounters and love, Yuuma was content to waste his time away. However, these dog days began to change with his chance meeting with the mysterious Inori, the Yuki-onna of Suzugaoka Gakuen. Soon after, he was invited by Ayano to the ‘ghost club’, which is actually not related to the occult, but rather a gathering place for people with regrets. He was made the new leader of the club despite his reluctance. 
 
Before long, he was surrounded by peculiar girls left and right: cool lone wolf Inori, carefree repeater Ayano, smitten kouhai Hikari, and pushy ‘bro’ Wakaba. Who will he end up in this irreplaceable youth story?

name: Hangoverse: Season 1
summary: Hangoverse is dumb game where the characters from the Hangover Cat's universe interact with each other in a college setting. Follow Harry as he's getting cucked left and right, and meet with old friends from previous Hangover Cat's NTR titles!

name: HackyZack
summary: You are Zack. Zack’s just a regular kid. Juggle balls with unique properties through platforming puzzles to a goal at the end of each stage. Help Zack fill his treasured book of stickers to unlock new characters and optional challenge levels, where you race against the timer to destroy targets as fast as possible.

name: Hairy Eyeballs.
summary: Shave your eyeballs while you discover some girls' thoughts on this desolate island. Tackle nationhood, transness and what it means to be a woman.

name: Hand of Fate
summary: Inspired by tarot and fantasy, all bets are off as you create your own journey by building a collection of cards used to deal out a boardgame-like dungeon teeming with enemies, treasure, and adventure. Upon entering combat, the cards come to life as the player is propelled into a beautiful 3D environment to brawl it out with foes. Draw your cards, play your hand, and discover your fate.

name: Happy Saint Sheol
summary: Two thousand years ago, the Pestis Disaster swept through the land, corrupting all living things and making it too difficult to live on the land. Having touched the darkest darkness the world has seen, one must now face the dazzling light. Thus I pose this question. Whose wings did I see that day?

name: Halloween Scrooge
summary: A short kinetic visual novel in which you play the main character, recently moved to a new town and uninterested in celebrating Halloween like the rest of the neighhbours. In a Halloween-themed twist on A Christmas Carol, you're visited by 3 handsome ghosts who attempt to convince you to stop being such a scrooge. Featuring flavourtext-affecting dialogue choices and a customizable protagonist name.

name: Hatsune Miku: Project Diva - Miku Uta, Okawari
summary: The first Hatsune Miku: Project Diva DLC was released by SEGA on the PSN Store on 25 March 2010. It featured 9 songs sung by Hatsune Miku, high-quality polygon PVs of all the songs, "*Hello, Planet" 8-bit minigame (featuring 4 levels), and a special Miku theme for PSP XrossMediaBar (XMB) menu.

name: Hatching
summary: Hatching is a short retro-inspired, point-and-click virtual pet experience based on the Finnish horror film Hatching (2022).

name: Halo 4: Crimson Map Pack
summary:
The Crimson map pack is the first DLC map pack released for use in War Games and Forge in Halo 4,
It includes 3 maps:
- Wreckage
- Harvest
- Shatter

8 additional achievements
- Now They Fly?
- Size Is Everything
- ODST
- Bigfoot
- David and Goliath
- Clay Pigeon
- Special Delivery
- Pump Yer Brakes

name: Hack.bak
summary: HACK.BAK is a terminal-based hacking game where the user searches a procedurally generated network for commands in order to decrypt their data which was sealed by hackers.

name: Haunted Hotel: Lost Dreams
summary: Can you unravel the secrets of that mysterious place that is somehow connected to your memories and save your wife?

name: Harukanaru Augusta 3: Masters New
summary: Harukanaru Augusta 3: Masters New is a Sports game, developed and published by T&E Soft, which was released in Japan in 1995.

name: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban: The Quest of Sir Cadogan
summary: This game present on the second disc of the DVD release of Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban focuses on Sir Cadogan traveling through portraits to get to the Gryffindor Common Room to take the place of the Fat Lady as guardian of the tower, having various misadventures en route. The player must guide Sir Cadogan through the portraits by choosing between two paths at certain points, in choosing the right path will help him save time, and choosing the wrong path will result in him performing a time-wasting and usually in a comical fashion.

name: Hayven Celestia: Under One Sky
summary: A lone hero must unite friend and foe in this Sci-fi Rock Opera Visual Novel

name: Halloween 1
summary:
This is a fan-made game based on John Carpenter's Halloween (1978 movie).

Everything seems fine while you're babysitting Tommy on Halloween night, until you receive a creepy phone call and someone tries to open the door. This unravels a horrifying nightmare where you have to fight for your life.

name: Harca
summary: HARCA is an accessible rhythm game platform where players can upload their own music, create custom charts, and compete on global leaderboards. With just five keys, players can immerse themselves in unique songs and daily updated rankings.

name: Harry Obby
summary: Harry Potter fan game with obstacle courses. It is a sandbox game and you can explore anywhere at Hogwarts. There are four houses for the player to select. The objective of the player is to collect all of the Famous Witches and Wizards Cards from the game.

name: Hannah and the Pirate Caves
summary: Hannah and the Pirate Caves is the first in the trilogy of Hannah the Brave games. Longing for an exciting change of pace from her boring and poorly-paying tavern job, Hannah researched and set out to explore the ancient caves built by pirates to stash their loot many years ago.

name: Halluci-Sabbat of Koishi
summary: Touhou Project, Komeiji Koishi's Action Game, with collision between sword and magic! Help Marisa hold a Sabbat of witches, and explore the way of treasure hunt with wisdom and strength. On the day of the war, there is the glory of death and no shame of life.

name: Harvest Moon: The Winds of Anthos - The Great Outdoors Pack
summary:
Go camping, explore with your animals, and even hunt for treasure in the newest DLC for Harvest Moon: Winds of Anthos!

Have your animals tag along with you as you explore Anthos! Your animals can even help you with their special skills while exploring!

Enjoy camping under the stars by the campfire! Make yummy s'mores and other camping-themed dishes to give you a boost!

Go treasure hunting to discover the hidden mysteries of Anthos! What secrets will you uncover with the new Treasure Hunting Mode on your DocPad?

name: Hana Awase: New Moon
summary: Spanning across time and realities, Hana Awase: New Moon is the story of a young woman drawn into the web of the game kasen, played with hanafuda cards. Through playing, she comes to meet five mysterious men, all of whom are elite players and all of whom guard secrets that hold the power to alter her world irreparably.

name: Hakuoki: Shinsengumi Kitan
summary: Hakuoki is a Japanese otome video game series by Idea Factory, first released for the PlayStation 2 on September 18th, 2008 and ported to many other platforms.

name: Han Seimei Senki Andorogynus
summary: Andorogynus is a top-down shoot-em-up. The player controls the titular hero(ine), shooting at constantly attacking enemies. Unlike in most games of the type, the screen scrolls down rather than up. The protagonist is equipped with a default single shot and has protective orbs revolving around that damage nearby enemies. The weapon can be enhanced (rapid fire, three-way fire, etc.) by collecting randomly descending power-ups. The player controls the male incarnation of the protagonist initially, but later switches to the female one.

name: Harvest Moon: Animal Parade
summary: Harvest Moon: Animal Parade offers more traditional Harvest Moon gameplay for the Nintendo Wii, and features a range of exotic animals for you to interact with.

name: Hadur
summary: HADUR is a free mobile location based multiplayer game for Android, iPhone, iPad and Windows Phones. It uses your GPS location to place you in the real world and let you conquer it. Let's go for glory!

name: Hangry Bear
summary: Bear your hunger and prepare for a paw-some time! Hangry Bear's arcade adventure lets you dash, flip, and dropkick your way through a hilarious frenzy. Can you keep your cool while your bear belly rumbles, racing against the clock to satisfy your fishy desires and secure bear-brilliant high scores?

name: Harvest Days: My Dream Farm
summary:
A unique mix of farming sim, life sim and business sim.

A new life in the country is calling! Fulfil your dreams and manage your very own farm in this lovingly designed open-world game. Work hard, manage your business wisely and your little farm might grow into a personal paradise, surrounded by boundless, untouched nature.

name: Hardwork Simulator
summary: A game about fooling others! (6th place Innovation Category Ludum Dare #49 Compo)

name: Hakuoki Zuisouroku Omokagebana
summary: A port that adds scenario.

name: Habitat Shapes
summary:
Enjoy the relaxing puzzle of Habitat Shapes by organizing spaces for three animal families – mammals, birds, and reptiles – using Fence/Wall pieces to keep them separated. Watch out: different families cannot touch, and any attempt triggers a funny “fight cloud,” sending the last piece back to the conveyor.

With 30 levels split between the structured Urban Zoo and the organic Safari Sanctuary, Habitat Shapes offers short, accessible, and reversible challenges. Pick, rotate, and place pieces on the grid, experiment with undo and restart, and find the perfect layout of space and barriers. Each move brings small victories and satisfying moments without time pressure, letting you enjoy a flawlessly organized zoo.

Perfect for fans of spatial organization, subtle visual humor, and puzzles that reward smart experimentation.

name: Hack Grid
summary: Hack Grid is a puzzle game & love letter to DOS gaming. Only one piece must remain on the board. Each type of piece has its own set of rules. Retro Sound Blaster 16 style audio will accompany you throughout the game. Hack the Grid!

name: Haunted Manager
summary: “If your fear is half-hearted, I will shut you down―――”My father, the head of the haunted mansion, said this to me on the first day of opening.

name: Hackmud
summary: Hackmud is a cyberpunk themed text-based hacking simulator for intel-compatible personal home computers. Get lost in a deep and complex world full of challenging puzzles as you engage in a rich narrative riddled with intrigue and deception.

name: Harlem Globetrotters World Tour
summary: For more than 80 years, the "Clown Princes" of the hardwood, have thrilled and delighted worldwide audiences; more than 123,000,000 spectators in 118 countries have witnessed basketball, Harlem Globetrotters style. Now, the Globetrotters, the world's greatest showmen, take their high-flying athleticism, and audacious antics off the road, and right into your home! DSI Games brings the excitement of Harlem Globetrotters basketball to your favorite video game system. The "can't miss" 'Trotter's experience is now a "don't miss" video game!

name: Halls of Death
summary:
Halls of Death is an adventure game where you play the role of one of many explorers who have entered the caverns and rooms over many floors, searching for the treasure within, the only difference hopefully is that you make it out alive. The screen is split into five different parts with two parts text, one a map of the floor you are on, your stats and finally what you can see in front off you or the creature you are fighting. Starting at the bottom of some steps, you move around the map searching each room and text tells you what you see and how many turns you have taken.

As you explore, some rooms will have traps, some will have treasure and others will have a creature or monster that wants to fight you seen from the side. You have a certain level of strength and psionics (magic) and you can either swing at the creature, retreat or use one of four spells which are sleep, teleportation, lighting and fireball. Spells sometimes don't work and can sometimes rebound and hit yourself. You both take it in turns to fight and it is game over if you lose all your strength. You can move your different levels of strength and psionics between each other as you avoid either reaching zero. Another level you have is constitution and this decreases as you explore further into the Halls of Death and so you need to return to the surface to rest.

name: Hack And Slash Fury: Mystic Girl Armor
summary: Buy this armor to use it on the game while you are playing or seeing video scenes.

name: Hatch
summary: Born into a punishing environment with no bearings, there is nowhere to go but up.

name: Hack And Slash Fury: Warrior Armor
summary: Buy this armor to use it on the game while you are playing or seeing video scenes.

name: Hack And Slash Fury: Dinosaur Armor
summary: Buy this armor to use it on the game while you are playing or seeing video scenes.

name: Hack And Slash Fury: Sorcerer Armor
summary: Buy this armor to use it on the game while you are playing or seeing video scenes.

name: Hare Nochi Munasawagi
summary: The story of Harenochi Munasawagi does not start in a very original way: the protagonist is a high-school boy named Kazuhiko, who is - surprise! - permanently horny, displaying his "affections" at any given opportunity to anyone young and female, including even his childhood friend Chihiro. But while the focus on the story is on Kazuhiko and his quest for physical intimacy (which often results in girls getting angry and beating him up), there are other rather disturbing elements that come into play later - in particular, bunny-like demons who share Kazuhiko's passion for the opposite sex...

name: Halloween 1985
summary:
Step into the arcade-era thrill of Halloween 1985!

When monsters steal Pumpkman’s pumpkins on Halloween night, it’s up to you to get them back! Dash through 5 vibrant, quirky levels, outsmarting classic foes like Dracula, The Mummy, and The Witch. Jump, dodge, and battle your way to their lairs, then take on the big boss in a final showdown!

With 3 game modes, a retro chiptune soundtrack, and high-score chasing just like the golden age, this pixel-art platformer delivers fast-paced, nostalgic fun.

Can you reclaim all the pumpkins and become a legend?

name: Hammer Dongers
summary:
Hammer Dongers is an up to 4 player party game with destroyable terrain! 
 
You NEED at least one more person and a controller, since only one person can play on keyboard and its a multiplayer game! 
 
This is meant to be a couch-play party game so the single player will have to come a bit later in development, once the multiplayer is polished and at its fullest. After all, having fun with your friends is the core of party games! ❤️ 
 
Beat your friends!! Dong them to oblivion. 
 
Supports one keyboard and up to four controllers 🎮 
 
All you need to play is: 
 
A friend: this is multiplayer-only for now! 
A controller: only one person can play on keyboard... for now 😉

name: Hardspace: Shipbreaker
summary: Welcome to LYNX, the galaxy’s leading ship-salvaging corporation! Across your career, you’ll have the privilege of paying your debt to us by purchasing salvaging rights to increasingly large and valuable ships. Cut them open and extract as much value as possible!

name: Hameln no Violin Hiki
summary: Hameln no Violin Hiki is a platform game based on the manga/anime series of the same name. You play the role of Hamel who is an adventurer with a violin as his trusty weapon. Hamel and his mascot Oboe arrives at Staccato, a small town attacked by monsters, and drives them away with his power. Impressed, a cute little girl named Flute decides to go with Hamel in order to find and destroy the evil power behind the attacks.

name: Hajimeru Sekai no Risouron: Goodbye World Index
summary:
That's not where you live.

The protagonist, a young boy named Shin Onomiya, is one of the "reincarnations" who answered the call of the god who rules the world.

I want you to save this world towards the right future.

What God has entrusted to him is the future of this twisted world itself. He is surrounded by friends who, like him, have been invited from different worlds. While fighting against a shadowy monster called "enemy of the world" and his quiet and lively daily life is going on.

His heart began to scar. The world he had lived in before was a lie, and the lie was killing him.

When he was reborn in another world, he asked God to give him abilities. It Is the power to see through the lies of others. He hoped that the lies of his past world would not hurt him again.

But at the same time, this power also reveals the hearts of his friends. What they hide in their hearts and what they want to stay away from. By touching the wounds of these girls, awkwardly, little by little, the distance between them grew closer.

Every day, the countdown to the end of the world ticks down in the "Doomsday Index".

Having lost their own place in the past, they hide the ideal of "this is how it should be" in their hearts, the World changes its shape according to the thoughts of men and women who have been invited. Behind the apocalypse.

Towards an ideal world held by others.

name: Hadean Tactics
summary: Hadean Tactics is a roguelike deckbuilding game fused with autobattler elements to create a unique strategy experience. Use your cards to influence the actions of your units and help your Hero defeat the Six Wings of Hell.

name: Hands of the Sovereign
summary: It's time to duel on Fardea Island! Encounter a colourful cast of rivals! Challenge your host: Lord Blackthorn! Assemble your own personal deck, and do battle upon a grid-based battlefield.

name: Hakuoki Reimeiroku Nagorigusa
summary:
Port of Hakuoki Reimeiroku for the PS3.

Years before the beginning of Hakuouki, the Shinsengumi was known as the Mibu Roushigumi. A wandering young man named Ibuki Ryuunosuke falls in with the group by chance just after they first come to Kyoto, and while grudgingly making friends with the members within, witnesses the dawning era of the Shinsengumi.

name: Haunted Hotel
summary: After crashing his car on the side of the road, a bewildered traveler finds himself checking in to the Haunted Hotel!

name: Hana
summary: Hana is a 3D top-down tactical MMORPG where you play as a Hanari, a race of elves whose civilization has been decimated. Confront formidable adversaries solo or with your friends, develop your guild, your commerce, and rebuild the Hanaris civilization.

name: Half-Life: Operation Rift
summary: This is the second part of HECU Corporal Timothy Collins story and another sequel to Half-Life: Operation Rosenberg.

name: Half-Life: Cleaner's Adventures
summary: You play as Bryan Anderson, a Black Mesa janitor who is unfortunate enough to get caught up in the Resonance Cascade and must now combat the vicious Xen forces and the hostile HECU.

name: Haunted House
summary: As can be inferred from the title, Haunted House is a Halloween themed escape game, though it is not particularly scary due to the child friendly art style and lack of jump scares, etc. The game was developed by KMart and features links to their website to buy Halloween costumes of various characters that are found in the game.

name: Happy Pong
summary: Play a cute free game on Dreamcast

name: Hannah Montana: One in a Million
summary:
Hannah Montana: One in a Million was a Plug It In & Play TV Game released by Jakks Pacific and developed by HotGen in 2007 and re-issued in 2012. The controller contains four games:

In "Lilly Boarding", you’ll have to guide Lilly through the city while she’s on her skateboard. You can jump and perform tricks to avoid obstacles and collect stars. The goal is to reach the end of the stage in the shortest time possible while collecting as many stars as you can. There are 5 stages in total, including the city in three slightly different versions, the pier, and the parking lot.

In Photo Frenzy, Hannah Montana has to throw autographed photos to her fans while walking around the neighborhood. The fans are hiding everywhere, so you have to be quick. There are 3 stages in total.

In Mannequin’s World, Hannah has to choose outfits for her concerts. On the screen, there are 15 outfits, and she gives you a description of what she wants. You must eliminate all the ones that don’t match until only one is left. There are 10 stages in total.

In Mall Mayhem, you have to accompany Miley (and later Hannah) to the mall to take care of various tasks, such as reaching a store to sign autographs or dealing with bullies. An arrow shows where you need to go, and you must reach the destination before time runs out. Fans will try to stop you and make you lose time. There are 8 stages in total.

name: Haro no Daibouken
summary: Dungeon RPG where you control Haro to take down Gundam characters.

name: Hallow Eve
summary: Hallow Eve is a short Halloween-themed ROM hack of Super Metroid. It is a major game overhaul in one-room form with heavily modified intro, title screen, menus, maps, colors, gameplay and sounds.

name: Hakuoki Reimeiroku Omohase Sora
summary:
Port of Hakuoki Reimeiroku for the PS Vita with new CGs.

Years before the beginning of Hakuouki, the Shinsengumi was known as the Mibu Roushigumi. A wandering young man named Ibuki Ryuunosuke falls in with the group by chance just after they first come to Kyoto, and while grudgingly making friends with the members within, witnesses the dawning era of the Shinsengumi.

name: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets: Spellcaster Knowledge
summary:
A minigame included in the widescreen DVD release of Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.

Spellcaster Knowledge: Triggered by selecting the wand on the study's desk. This is a quiz based on spells cast by various characters in the film, the scene plays up to the point where the spell is cast and the player has to choose what happened as a result from three possible answers. If an incorrect answer is given the game moves to the next

name: Halo 3
summary:
Halo 3 is a shooter game where players primarily experience gameplay from a first-person perspective. Much of the gameplay takes place on foot, but also includes segments focused on vehicular combat. The balance of weapons and objects in the game was adjusted to better adhere to the "Golden Triangle of Halo": these are weapons, grenades, and melee attacks, which are available to a player in most situations. Players may dual-wield some weapons, forgoing the use of grenades and melee attacks in favor of the combined firepower of two weapons. Many weapons available in previous installments of the series return with minor cosmetic and power alterations. Unlike previous installments, the player's secondary weapon is visible on their player model, holstered or slung across the player's back.
Halo 3 introduces "support weapons", which are cumbersome two-handed weapons that slow the player, but offer greatly increased firepower in return. In addition to weapons, the game contains a new class of gear called equipment; these items have various effects, ranging from defensive screens to shield regeneration and flares. Only one piece of equipment can be carried at a time. The game's vehicular component has been expanded with new drivable and AI-only vehicles.

name: Hannah
summary:
Hannah is a puzzle platformer horror survival game. You play as Hannah, a teenager born in the 80s, who tries to understand her personality by taking an internal journey to her childhood and discovering what went wrong.

You will immerse yourself in the depths of this dreamlike reality in which Hannah will have to be cunning, to solve puzzles; use the elements at your disposal to create devices and vehicles and avoid dying on the way.

name: Havenless
summary:
A zombie-fighting dating simulation that serves as LucyDream's follow-up to their wildly successful debut 'Dangerous Fellows'.

The story follows a girl named Jae (name changeable) that gets caught up in a church's shady affairs while trying to hide that she was recently infected herself. Of note is that this is LucyDream's first dating sim to have a female love interest option.

name: Harihari Seal Paradise
summary: A sticker-designing game for the Casio Loopy. Players can paint and stamp unique creations to print on the Loopy's built-in sticker printer.

name: Haunted Science: Welcome To I.R.H.I.A.
summary: Fraudsters, Hacks, Swindlers, Cheats, names that get tossed around a lot when it comes to dealing with paranormal investigators, but what if we told you that not all of them are making it up on the spot? Would you believe us?

name: Hanakisou
summary: A young man awakens in the snowy wilderness with no memory. The boy watching over him informs him that his name is Kuroto, which means the winter that announces the end. Claiming to be a traveling companion, Hanashiro reassures Kuroto and says he will help him regain his memory. More questions arise once they reach the nearest town and are soon confronted by the military. While Kuroto attempts to grasp the quickly developing events around him, snow quietly continues to fall.

name: Hakuoki: Edo Blossoms - Edo Treasure Box
summary: Get more romance out of your favorite warrior bachelors in these six never-before-seen episodes!

name: Hakushaku to Yousei: Yume to Kizuna ni Omoi wo Hasete
summary: Hakushaku to Yousei: Yume to Kizuna ni Omoi Hasete is an otome game released in Japan in 2009.

name: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
summary: The PSP and NDS versions are not a direct, linear adaptation of the movie, but instead take the player through a larger universe of the series, with many unrelated characters and tasks, eventually furthering the story through cutscenes. At Hogwarts, Harry, the sole character controlled by the player, has to perform many quests for other students, such as stopping bullies, collecting ingredients, or even finding back Luna's accessories that have disappeared. Hogwarts can be explored freely and quests are triggered through cutscenes or by talking to other characters. These are stored in a Remembrall log, where names or characters can be highlighted to find their location on the map.

name: Halo: GoldSource
summary: Halo: GoldSource recreates the legendary gameplay of the iconic & beloved franchise in the Half-Life engine.

name: Hanayoi Romanesque: Ai to Kanashimi - Sore ha Kimi no Tame no Aria
summary: An otome game released in 2008.

name: Happy Hour Hero
summary: Time is short, just like our signature cocktail. Will you make a stir and gain recognition as best bartender in town, or get mixed up and bottle it?

name: Hamster Cozy: Tears of Acorn Valley
summary: In the peaceful village of Acornville, an ancient legend tells of a treasure hidden by the town's first explorer, a secret that has intrigued generations.

name: Hard Hitter Tennis
summary: Hard Hitter Tennis challenges you to become the best in the world. Choose one of 14 athletes or make your own, and grow your character's stats over the course of a year. Playing well during the game will increase the mentality meter, giving your player a better chance of making tough shots. The mentality meter can also be expended to make a shot that will be difficult to hit back. Whichever player has won the most money from tournaments by the end of the year is crowned champion.

name: Happy Island Life
summary: Collect materials and supplies scattered on the map to create equipment to fight against danger and tools to collect trees and minerals; build and upgrade your housing, manufacture the necessities for survival, and build your housing into a cozy cabin. Please keep an eye on your hunger, thirst, and blood levels for you and your partner at all times, the game will be over once your blood level reaches zero.

name: Halver
summary: Halve the blocks into two equal parts and solve the unique puzzles in a game with a blueprint visual style and meditative music

name: Happy Marriage Project: Starting from 9 Years Old
summary: This is a sample game created in "RPG Maker MZ" by Photosho Shokunin. Comical love simulation RPG about a young girl hunting for the ideal husband.

name: Hamidashi Creative
summary: Hamidashi Creative is a romantic visual novel with a school setting.

name: Harvest Moon DS: Island of Happiness
summary: In Harvest Moon: Island of Happiness you develop the island by growing crops and taking care of animals and expanding your farm. The better you do, the more the island will grow, and the more others will start to move onto the island. Though it was not your original dream, now is you chance to create your very own paradise!

name: Harvey's Hundreds
summary: Harvey’s Hundreds is a brain-teasing matching game from Steve Harvey. Select your difficulty level, and start testing your problem-solving skills. Simply match the tiles and win points. The faster and better you play, the more points you have for lives and cool features.

name: Hakuoki SSL: Sweet School Life
summary: A reimagining of the Hakuoki series in a modern high school setting.

name: Havenhold
summary: Havenhold is an Action Sandbox MMO inspired by the ancient Far East. Train as a warrior monk, wield primordial powers, craft, trade, and compete against rivals in riveting battles for access to the sacred peak.

name: Harvester of Dreams : Episode 1
summary: Harvester of Dreams is a first person adventure game, taking you on board a steampunk airship. Unravel the secret of the ship while you are exploring it room after room.

name: Havok Balloons Tech Showcase
summary: Havok usually works behind the scenes helping to power your favourite AAA games, but this tech showcase proved too popular to keep to industry only meetings.

name: Hallowed Crucible
summary: In Hallowed Crucible you're a crusader who found a gun (and a little more). Undeath plagues your world. The zombies are heretics. Do what must be done in this single player zombie slaying arcade shooter.

name: Hand of Doom
summary: Sign a contract in blood! Travel throughout the planes of existence slaying or befriending powerful doomlords in this wizard simulator inspired by the FMV games and dungeon crawlers of the early 90's. Learn powerful spells to solve puzzles and combat the dark forces amassing against you.

name: Harvey Norman: Windsor Queensland - Super Shareware: Games Volume 1
summary: A shareware CD games that was distributed by Australian retailer Harvey Norman in 1996.

name: Hanage Nuki! Nuki! - Nose Hair Master
Haunter
summary: Haunter is a small game about a ghost who has to haunt a mansion before the landlord returns. Turn off all the lights and avoid the guards.

name: Hayo and the Emporium
summary: Deckbuilding roguelike. In Hayo and the Emporium, display the items your customers desire and earn as much gold as possible. Strategically manage your emporium to avoid bankruptcy!

name: Hammy
summary: The ultimate hamster ball arcade game!

name: HaremKingdom
summary: HaremKingdom is a pure-love comedy in another world! Amidst magical hijinks and five adoring brides, what kind of harem will you choose to build?

name: Hacking with Benefits
summary: Help the waifus from cracker attacks by recovering their precious pics! A CASUAL action game, master your reflexes and hack a perfect picture without any errors! Use your hack skills for a good cause, and get some "awesome prizes" as a reward.

name: Harry Potter: Hogwarts Mystery
summary: Harry Potter: Hogwarts Mystery is a role-playing video game developed and published by Jam City under license from Portkey Games. Based on J.K. Rowling's Harry Potter novels, the game is set in the Wizarding World and situated before the events of the series. Players step into the shoes of a customizable character enrolling in Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, where they engage in various activities including attending magic classes, learning spells, dueling rivals, dating characters, playing Quidditch, and embarking on quests.

name: Happy's Clocks
summary: Run around an enormous mysterious house that once belonged to your dad, while running away from terrifying monsters and solving interesting puzzles. Discover what happened or maybe what was supposed to happen when you left.

name: Hallucinations
summary: The protagonist of the game is suspected of suffering from hallucinations. Players need to find different places in the room. Can the protagonist survive the eighth day while being examined?

name: Hatsune Miku: Project Diva - Mega Mix Song Pack 16
summary:
Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA Mega Mix Song Pack 16 includes:

- Dreaming Leaf
- Song of Eternity -DIVAMIX-
- Holy Star -2010 DIVA mix-
- Rain With A Chance of Sweet*Drops
- Pane dhiria
- maigo life
- Soiyassa!!
- Beware of the Miku Miku Germs♪
- Perico Space Shipper
- Dance of Many

name: Haunted House
summary: "Cheong Wing Mansion" A plot game set in a public housing estate, Prosperous Mansions is an exploration of Hong Kong in the olden days, with elements of ghosts and urban legends. The game is divided into units, each of which has its own story, yet is closely intertwined.

name: Halloween Stories: Black Book
summary: When your world and the supernatural realm collide, can you survive?

name: Hammerfist
summary: Hammerfist is a side-scrolling beat 'em up video game developed by Vivid Image and released in 1990 for the Commodore Amiga, Atari ST, Commodore 64, Amstrad CPC and ZX Spectrum.

name: Happiness 1 Definitive Edition
summary:
It's a typical day in April.

Just another day to nap it away

All you ever do is watch

Watch as life passes you by

Observe as the flow of time moves forward

Like someone filming a documentary, you refuse to intervene in affairs that don't directly concern you.

You refuse to do anything that isn't obligatory.

Anything you're not forced to do

For better or worse you're nothing more than....

an Observer.

But when something really special is suddenly at stake

''Will you become a God or stay an Observer?"

name: Harley's Humongous Adventure
summary: The player controls Harley, a man in a green suit who has shrunk himself to size of a bar of soap. The player's mission is to gather parts of Harley's (presumably) now-destroyed shrinking machine to return him to normal size. As the player advances through levels, they pick items such as tacks, rubberbands and marbles. The many locations the player adventures through is Harley's lab where the initial incident occurs, Harley's Kitchen, Harley's toy room, where the player pilots a toy tank by himself, Harley's Bathroom, and other stages.

name: Hain
summary: H.A.I.N: Heir of the Ancient Immortal Necromancer is an asymmetrical co-op horror/thriller game for 1–4 players. Explore hostile regions, collect ancient artifacts, and begin the final ritual. But one of you will become H.A.I.N, the betrayer, and trust will collapse.

name: Hakuoki DS
summary: Port of Hakuoki for the Nintendo DS.

name: Hatsune Miku: VR Future Live
summary:
Hatsune Miku: VR Future Live is the premier virtual reality concert experience.
Starring the digital diva herself, Miku's show is exclusive to PlayStationVR.

name: Harvest Moon for Girl
summary: Harvest Moon for Girl is essentially Harvest Moon: Back to Nature with a slightly tweaked story, a few different gameplay mechanics, and you can play as a girl.

name: Harrowed World: Portents In Red
summary:
Step into a shadowy and dangerous world where you are the monster. You died. Tonight, you died but then someone brought you back. Not as you were but as a vampire.

Left abandoned by the one responsible, you must learn to survive the treachery of your vampiric peers and satisfy the gnawing thirst and hunger within.

A night of chaos and confusion coincides with your passage to undeath and when the dust settles you are tasked with finding out why.

The portents in red. What do they mean? Only you can find out.

Danger is everywhere, and trust is a rare commodity. Choose your allies and enemies well.

Good luck, vampire.

name: Happy Bones: Welcome Home
summary: After receiving a frantic message from her father, Laura heads out to her parents house located inside a cult compound to search for the truth, in this complete remake of the classic horror themed JRPG!

name: Hazel the Plant Witch
summary:
A kind and cosy game about listening to others. 
 
People say talking to plants helps them grow. Hazel knows better. Most plants can't understand human speech. Luckily, Hazel is a brilliant techno witch who has made a gadget that will help her communicate to plants! By listening to plants, Hazel can record what plants are saying to her. This way, she can replay that dialogue to other plants and have a real conversation with a plant in their own language! 
 
Can Hazel overcome the limitations of speaking in pre-recorded messages and help her plant friends out?

name: Hazel Sky
summary: Hazel Sky is a heartfelt adventure about a young engineer facing his destiny and his desires. Fix ramshackle flying machines and jump, climb, swing, and slide through a beautiful, mysterious world.

name: H.A.D.E.S Zero
summary: Survival horror where you explore collapsed facilities, face biotechnological horrors, and survive with limited resources.

name: Haunted Hearts Hotel
summary: Check in to your hotel, and check out the ghosts! Sexy specters await you - but can you fix up the hotel in style so that the living guests will find luxury, too?

name: Hay Day Pop
summary:
Welcome to Hay Day Pop, the latest puzzle game from the creators of Hay Day!

POP through puzzles, harvest crops and build the farm of your dreams!

Solve puzzles, complete farm tasks, and breathe new life into the land. But building your dream farm won’t be that easy! Puff, Inc.’s industrial operation has clogged the sky with smog.

Clear up the smog to expand your farm, find lush land for crops, and discover more buildings to restore. The more smog you clear, the more chances you’ll get to unlock new decorations and animals!

Solve puzzles to get farm energy! Match two or more puzzle pieces to form explosive boosters and create clever combos. The bigger the match, the better the boost! Every puzzle you complete gets you a step closer to building your dream farm.

Use your farm energy to harvest crops and sell them to visitors to earn coins! Use coins to uncover new areas and upgrade your farm. Level up to unlock endless possibilities to repair, design and customize your slice of paradise!

Populate your farm with cute cows, buzzing bumblebees, plump piggies and more!

While you’re not hard at work on the farm, meet your neighbours and make new friends! Join a neighbourhood and complete deliveries with your friends to reap even bigger rewards. See who has the best farm around!

Every month brings a new season and with each new season comes fresh puzzles popping fun! New game pieces, levels and decorations are just around the corner.

Legend-dairy puzzles and farming await in Hay Day Pop!

name: Halloween Hidden Object Bundle
summary: Immerse yourself in the mysterious world of Halloween with our exclusive hidden object bundle, which includes three captivating games: Ominous Tales: Forsaken Isle, Witch's Pranks: Frogs Fortune and Dracula's Legacy.

name: Hay Buddy
summary:
Hay Buddy is a game that allows you to play it with your Buddy "two(2) player" or just play it by yourself. Touch the button to make the little robo FLY and avoid hitting the spikes throughout the game.. Gain scores as much as you can while tapping the button.  
  
  
"Two is better than one "  
  
  
What is your Highest Score? Share it to your family and friends..

name: Happy Birthday
summary: You will play as a simple and brave little girl, relax at your own pace, interact with the friendly people of Moon Valley, experience adventures through life and death, and finally return to the warmth of home for birthdays and Christmas!

name: Hammer of Pain
summary: Hammer Of Pain. Dive into a pixel-art, medieval adventure with Silver, the master blacksmith, and his huntress daughter, Nora. Their riveting tale of courage and heritage awaits you. Unfold their story, savor the detail, and get hooked on their world!

name: Hanoi Puzzles: Solid Match
summary: A new game concept inspired by the classic Tower of Hanoi. Assemble towers stacking pieces of the same color on a hexagonal board with a mysterious and relaxing atmosphere.

name: Hades-Plan
summary: Mysterious viruses are raging, and humanity is facing a crisis of apocalypse. Several girls have powerful antibodies in their bodies to resist virus invasion. They became the last hope

name: Harvest Cafe
summary: Explore, grow, repair and cook delicious food! Harvest Cafe combines an open-world adventure with a restaurant business simulation, giving you the opportunity to enjoy farm life.

name: Harukanaru Toki no Naka de Ultimate
summary: A remake with fully voiced and redrawn stills.

name: Handyman Corporation
summary: In Handyman Corporation you become the owner of a business where you handle a variety of jobs in cleaning, maintenance, design, and construction. Accept contracts, play minigames to perform every task required. Then expand your company – buy spare parts, tools, train skills, and manage.

name: Haiku, the Baby Robot
summary: Take control of Haiku, the Baby Robot, collect battery-packs and bring them to the central battery to stop the machine world from corrupting.

name: Hands Up! Charades Headbands
summary: Get ready for endless laughter and unforgettable memories with Hands Up—the beloved party charades game now supercharged with AI! With over 10,000 five-star ratings and more than a decade of bringing people together, this word-guessing sensation just keeps getting better.

name: Harpy's Curse
summary:
A fearsome harpy exiled to a deadly labyrinth, you must find and defeat four guardians before confronting the Great Sphinx to escape. Fly through corridors of rock, brick and bone that hide strange secrets. Explore and evade dire traps and denizens, while finding powers and treasure to prepare you for your final showdown.

Harpy's Curse is a homebrew Metroidvania developed by Todd Furmanski and published by Atari Age.

name: Hail Britannia
summary: Hail Britannia is a text-based game with lite RPG elements set in an alternate 1944 where the Central Powers won World War 1.

name: Hakuoki Shinkai: Tsukikage no Shou
summary:
Hakuoki Shinkai: Tsukikage no Shou is a story of a samurai who fought for his belief during the chaotic Edo period. This is a work that took up the daily story and the backside of the hero. The hero and the capture characters would be intertwined.

The main characters are Toshizo Hijikata, Souji Okita, Keisuke Yamanami, Susumu Yamazaki, Hachiro Iba, and Chikage Kazama.

The content of the game is a "common story" related to the season of Shinsengumi, "individual story" that deepens the bond with capture characters, and “complementary story” that teaches the relationship with the land that Shinsengumi. It has been constructed.

name: Hack And Slash Fury: Dark Girl Armor
summary: Buy this armor to use it on the game while you are playing or seeing video scenes.

name: Hamsterdam
summary:
"Hamsterdam is a game where rhythm & precision meets some good old fashioned button mashing. With classic arcade brawling mechanics and tap and swipe martial arts combos, the power of Hamster-fu is in your paws!"

"You hold the power to start a revolution in your paws, and only you can bring justice to the mean streets of Hamsterdam! Will you be the hero your town needs? Will you become the Hamster-fu master you were born to be? Will you defeat the whisker twister in chief, the vile Chinchilla Marlo? You bet your bushy tail!"

name: Hauma: A Detective Noir Story
summary: Hauma is an episodic noir interactive graphic novel centered around the exploits of former detective Judith, her fixation on an old murder investigation, and how this unravels conspiracies within the upper echelons of society.

name: Half-Life: Pulse
summary:
Pulse is a MOD for Half-Life 1. Pulse takes place in Black Mesa after the incident. You are famous scientist Gordon Freeman. In the beginning of Pulse, you are in Surface Lab A Security Complex, a lab and security station on the absolute surface of the Black Mesa Research Facility. You are working with your scientist pals when one scientist working with a hazardous radiation meter detects high radiation amounts coming from all over. They radio into the Administrator's office, the office of Dr. Wallace Breen. Instead of Breen answering, they pick up a remote conversation between Breen and an unknown voice. "It's done," Breen said. "The Xenian crystal triggered a dimensional rift between Earth and the boarderworld Xen. Now let's get to the surface!" "I'm sure my employers will be pleased," says the unknown voice, and then silence fills the room followed by an explosion. The other scientists are amazed that the Administrator of Black Mesa himself would work with someone to trigger such a disaster and are trying to turn Breen in to the Special Projects Executive, the overseers of the Black Mesa Research Facility. The only way to get the S.P.E. to believe them is to get Dr. Breen's special operations profile from his office and hand it over to the S.P.E. as evidence. The scientists, however, are terrified of entering Black Mesa after a resonance cascade saying it is too dangerous. Gordon Freeman volunteers to go into Black Mesa, retrieve Breen's Administrative profile and bring him to justice.

This MOD suggests that Gina Cross was the one to push the xenian crystal into the anti-mass spectrometer and Gordon was not near Sector C at the time. Surface Lab A Security Complex is located on the surface of Sector D.

The scientists detect that Breen's Administrative profile is located in the Lambda Complex so your goal as Gordon Freeman is to get the Lambda Complex and retrieve Breen's profile and make it back to Surface Lab A alive.

name: Half-Life: Decay
summary:
Half-Life: Decay is an expansion pack for Valve Software's science fiction, first-person shooter video game Half-Life. Developed by Gearbox Software and published by Sierra Entertainment, Decay was released as part of the PlayStation 2 version of Half-Life. It is the third expansion pack for Half-Life, and like its predecessors, Decay returns to the setting and timeline of the original story, albeit portraying the story from the viewpoint of a different set of protagonists: two scientists working in the Black Mesa Research Facility. Decay is a cooperative multiplayer game, designed to be played by two people working together to pass through the game's levels.

In September 2008, a group of Ukrainian developers unofficially ported the game to Windows as a modification of the PC version of Half-Life.

name: Happy Holes
summary: HAPPY HOLES - is an erotic game in the genre of "Arkanoid", in which you will have to break the cubes and gradually discover really beautiful and hot images.

name: Half-Life: Echoes
summary: A Half-Life Total Conversion set in the Half-Life universe. You are a Scientist, Candidate Twelve, On your way to work at an unspecified location for unspecified duties. I think you know the rest...

name: Halmaverse
summary: A relaxing board game where the goal is to move your pieces to the opposite corner.

name: Half-Life: Extended
summary:
Half-Life: Extended is a project dedicated to improving upon many aspects of the original game by achieving consistency between all the expansions, restoring unused content as well as adding new one and reimagining many aspects of the original maps.

Half-Life Extended: Day One is composed of the same chapters as the original Half-Life’s demo under the same name (minus Inbound). In this release you will see:

- Hazard Course
- Anomalous Materials
- Unforeseen Consequences
- Office Complex
- We’ve Got Hostiles

It is known that our mod changes many things that affect how the game plays. However, only 3 out of 5 chapters in the demo contain proper combat, so we’ve made a decision not to immediately overload the game with all the new stuff we’ve prepared.

Instead, Day One will serve as the entryway to Extended’s proper gameplay, gradually introducing you to updated weapons and vanilla enemies’ (and allies’) new stats, abilities and weapons.

name: Harmful: The Second Tape
summary: A PSX Horror adventure sequel. Play as Agent and Killer as a disturbing story unravels.

name: HappyKids
summary: A casual game consisting of several mini-games.

name: Half-Life: The Core
summary: Half-Life: The Core is a classic retelling of the events surrounding the Resonance Cascade disaster from a new perspective; that of Engineer Maurice Andrews.

name: Harley-Davidson & L.A. Riders
summary: In Harley-Davidson & L.A. Riders, the player rides one of five Harley-Davidson models. The objective is to complete a series of checkpoints around Los Angeles under a time limit. The objective is similar to the later Sega arcade game, Crazy Taxi (1999).

name: Haunted Ice Cream
summary: Haunted Ice Cream is a fast-paced time-management and rhythm simulation game where you play as a ghostly ice cream vendor serving spooky treats to restless spirits. Press the right keys in perfect timing to scoop and stack eerie flavors before your possession meter overflows, all wrapped in vibrant neon pixel art and ghostly charm.

name: Half-Life: Enriched
summary: Half-Life: Enriched aims to update the look and feel of Half-Life with reworked maps and artwork.

name: Hakuoki: Chronicles of Wind and Blossom
summary:
Two legendary visual novels come together in Hakuoki: Chronicles of Wind and Blossom, a remastered compilation of Hakuoki: Edo Blossoms and Hakuoki: Kyoto Winds, each among the most beloved entries in the acclaimed Japanese otome series. Players take the role of young heroine Chizuru as she is surrounded by the handsome warriors of the Shinsengumi. As battle ensues, who will emerge victorious and who will claim Chizuru's heart?

Embrace the political and interpersonal drama of feudalism while navigating romantic scenarios and witnessing events inspired by Japanese history, brought to life through beautifully illustrated cutscenes and passionate dialogue sequences. Explore multiple story routes across both epic visual novels, renowned by long-time fans of the series while serving as a standalone jumping-on point for new players.

This updated version includes revised text for the best possible experience, making Hakuoki: Chronicles of Wind and Blossom the definitive way for players to enjoy the game!

name: Hao x Sora: The Sky's Abound
summary: Ride beyond imagination in Hao x Sora: The Sky's Abound, the first action title in the Project Natura series. Rise as a hero out of their time and into the future of Natura, chasing down a old villain with unimaginable speed. Change the board - Equip a garage of hoverboards to store between runs and apply to different situations. Chase the world - Risk it all and choose when to end your run - either preserving your boards or bailing for a hell of a finish.

name: Half-Life FX: Single
summary:
A singleplayer mod for Half-Life, powered by the Half-Life FX Graphics Add-on, which demonstrates a lot of its new features.

There is an intro and one full game level, where you will fight the soldiers, solve a couple of problems in the Half-Life style and even open the keypads with previously found key codes. Some graphic features where not used and therefore cut away (parallax mapping, volumetric fog). However in the full version of HLFX: Single we plan to use them.

name: Havker-Man X
summary: HAVKERMAN X is an open world, post apocalyptic, first person shooter, immersive Sim. Featuring high risk / high reward gunfights, a multitude of weapons and augmentations to collect to hone your playstyle, and a branching story with quests where you can explore and decide the fate of the wasteland.

name: Harrowing Gate: Ghost Dimension
summary:
Step beyond the veil in Harrowing Gate: Ghost Dimension, a chilling survival horror experience where reality fractures and the dead do not rest. After a mysterious event opens the Harrowing Gate—a rift between the living world and a spectral realm—you awaken trapped in a decaying town consumed by darkness and haunted echoes of its former inhabitants.

Every shadow hides a presence, every sound could be a warning, and every choice might be your last. Uncover lost memories, perform ancient rituals, and wield arcane technology to manipulate the realm. But beware—the longer you gaze into the Ghost Dimension, the more it gazes back, twisting your mind and reshaping your surroundings.

Survive the terror, unravel the mystery, and awaken.

name: Harry Potter: Mini Action Game - Harry Potter
Harem Girl: Isabella
summary: Harem Girl: Isabella is a simple puzzle game in which your goal is to swap tiles and complete each illustration.

name: Happy Lab
summary: Welcome to the "Happy Lab"! You are a new intern at the most advanced science facility. Your daily job would be to train our AI "Aurora". "Aurora" purpose is to create the most advanced armor and fix all glitches on the way if there are any.

name: Half-Life Deathmatch: Source
summary: Half-Life Deathmatch: Source is a recreation of the first multiplayer game set in the Half-Life universe. Features all the classic weapons and most-played maps, now running on the Source engine.

name: Halo Infinite: Operation - Great Journey
summary: Operation: Great Journey launched as part of Halo Infinite’s 2024 Winter Update to coincide with the 20th anniversary of Halo 2. The update includes a new weapon, sandbox balance changes, a playlist featuring Halo 2-inspired gameplay and classic maps, a new Operation Pass, and updates to Forge.

name: Hana
summary: HANA—A cyberpunk puzzle-solver. “AI test run: successful. Your serial number: 22500814. Your mission is to help our clients live a perfect life.” —An unknown record, a cyberpunk ensemble. A choice of souls and reality, a story of the savior and the saved. Year 2250, Winter Lake City. Connect now.

name: Hagane: The Final Conflict
summary: Hagane: The Final Conflict is a 1994 action-platform video game developed by CAProduction and published by Red Entertainment and Hudson for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System. The player takes on the role of a ninja cyborg named Hagane on his path to take revenge on an opposing ninja faction. The game combines traditional Japanese ninja and samurai aesthetics with a futuristic setting. The player has a wide variety of weapons, moves, and attacks at their disposal to defeat enemies and progress through the game. Hagane released to positive reception, and was compared favorably to classic side-scrolling action games. Reviewers praised the controls, art design, and challenge but criticized the quality of the graphics and sound.

name: Hakuoki Yuugiroku Taishitachi no Daienkai
summary: Compilation of three spin-off Hakuoki games in one package, two of which are remasters from PlayStation Portable, Hakuoki Yuugiroku and Hakuoki Yuugiroku 2 Matsuribayashi to Taishitachi, with the third being original to this release. While going through story episodes you get to play various mini games at intervals.

name: Haffy DX
summary:
Traverse four varied stages of strange, wacky enemies, fast-paced bullet dodging action and ultra-threatening bosses. Experience hand-drawn* cinematics between each level to keep you waiting for what's next. Feeling overwhelmed? Your starship can change into 3 different forms, each with their own killer arsenal. And if that's not enough, you can just BOMB 'EM!

The one thing standing between the Sagitaria-IV and the enemy is YOU. Get on your pilot goggles, prepare for space combat you won't soon forget.

name: Hair Boy
summary: Hair boy is a video game for the Amstrad CPC 464, strongly inspired by Meat Boy (2008), created by Edmund McMillen. It is a platform game where the objective is to jump and rebound in the map, to achieve each map objective. Originally the video game was developed for the CPCRetroDev 2016 contest.

name: Hard Ball Wikie
summary: HARD BALL WIKIE is a two-dimensional platform game. The game contains various dangers waiting for you.

name: Harmony Havoc
summary: A roguelike shooter where you create music to power up your battles and experience what it's like to be part of a heavy metal band.

name: Hachi Hachi Mystery
summary: Hachi Hachi Mystery is a interactive Visual Novelf taking place at university. It's your first year as a university student and you're going to discover this new life! ...Well, that's how it should have happened.

name: Happy Nuclear
summary: Happy Nuclear is an evidence-based investigation game where players act as detectives to prevent a disaster. They analyze interconnected case information on an investigation board, primarily using old CCTV and access logs. Cases link together at the end, and each replay introduces changes.

name: Hard Truck Apocalypse
summary: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland of diesel and dust, bandits and mobsters rule the last remaining cities, controlling all vital trade routes and destroying any hope of a return to a lawful world.

name: Hanzi Match
summary: "Hanzi Match" is a match puzzle game. Select three same Chinese characters to them. Match all the characters to win. The pronunciation will be played every time you click on the character!

name: Hamish
summary: Hamish is a fast-paced, momentum-driven action platformer where every step could be your last. Run, jump, and grapple your way through rising lava, snowy peaks, neon-lit cities, and more, mastering speed and precision while taking down ruthless enemies.

name: Hana Awase New Moon: Iroha
summary: Port of Hana Awase: Iroha for the Switch, simultaneously released in Japanese, Chinese, and English.

name: Happy Tree Friends: Flippy's Flying Frenzy
summary: Happy Tree Friends: Flippy's Flying Frenzy was a Happy Tree Friends cellphone game developed by Daydream and published by Kiloo under license by Signatures Network

name: Harvest Moon: One World - Far East Adventure Pack
summary: A new chapter, new characters, and even new crops await you in the Far East Adventure Pack! Unlock an entire island! Explore the exotic land of Wagashi! Woo the locals! Meet new animals!

name: Hartacon Tactics
summary:
Hartacon Tactics is a turn-based tactical RPG, featuring higly deterministc mechanics, beautiful hand-painted 2D art and deep gameplay.
Hire characters of unique classes, and wisely use their strengths, skills and weapons to defeat tough enemies as you travel through the continent of Kaus in the single-player campaign, or challenge other players in co-op multiplayer battles.

name: Hajime no Ippo: The Fighting! DS
summary: The top selling boxing manga Hajime no Ippo illustrates the growth of the pushover Makunouchi Ippo. Through the sport, the boy matured both in spirit and in body. By meeting other boxers in the ring, he found both his way in life and purpose. Now you don't have to be a passive spectator, step into the ring in the Challenge Mode with Ippo and experience the eye opening matches he went through. Besides the matches in the series, you can arrange games with your friends through the wi-fi facility of the DS. There is an abundance of minigames that will affect your player character's attributes such as reflexes and attack power, be sure to try them all out and max your stats before the great game. Pick a fight with anyone in the roster in the Free Match Mode, you can expand the roster by defeating more and more opponents in the Challenge Mode. Try out in boxing and see if you can find your way through life via the sport.

name: HardLander
summary: HardLander is a tough-as-nails "Rocket Wrestling" arena designed for up to 4 players. Invite three of your friends to compete for bragging rights and couch cred in what might be the most advanced rocket wrestling simulation ever created! Practice your piloting expertise through 40 punishing challenge courses that will be sure to have you throwing your controller across the room as you hone your skills.

name: Haunted Dawn: The Zombie Apocalypse
summary: It's a single-play FPS game with a movie-like story that the main characters escape from the zombie world. Escape from the zombies and survive with a variety of modes and of a number of weapons that are leveled up and released! The long-awaited ending is waiting for you. ·Each stage, you have a mission based on the story. You can enjoy a suspenseful play. ·There are various zombies big and small, it's fun to target them with special attacks. ·Collect all the various weapons used in the FPS game and all the special weapons that match the zombie's worldview. ·Clear the movie-like stories, the various wave modes, and the zombie modes such as Infinite Mode to earn bonuses. ·Zombies are waiting on a wide variety of stages, including battles on the subway, schools, hospitals, companies, etc. ·When you completely clear certain missions during the story, you can play the hidden stages that are not visible on the map. ·Enjoy the satisfactory playtime, clear the last stage and survive, and the ending is waiting for you! What kind of ending is that?! Prologue Terry and his girlfriend Shelly currently work at an IT company. One day, they are invited to a friend's home whom they have been very close to while in college. On that day, mysterious accidents occurred : terrorist attacks and an aircraft crash by armed forces. After partying all night and watching sports on TV, Terry and Shelly left to go to bed first... Zombies, the mysterious creatures dead living, have appeared in our…

name: Hack And Slash Fury: Car Armor
summary: Buy this armor to use it on the game while you are playing or seeing video scenes.

name: Hanoi
summary: An iPhone version of the puzzle game Towers of Hanoi.

name: Hazmat Hijinx
summary: In Hazmat Hijinks, you’ll need multicolored hazmat suits for protection as you traverse chemical spills, walk through radiation, and battle the Cleaners in your quest to rescue Hanford’s furry friend.

name: HavenFlower: Regrets Of
summary: Prepare to immerse yourself in the unforgiving world of HavenFlower: Regrets Of, a fantasy/sci-fi RPG inspired by the PS2 era. The story centers around Loup, a charming baker android seeking vengeance against the merciless army that decimated their bakery.

name: Halloween Stories: Written in Blood - Collector's Edition
summary: Can you help Catherine rescue her friends in a terrifying new case?

name: Harrowed World: What's Past Is Portents
summary: Step into a dark and unforgiving world where vampires pull the strings of humanity. You are not the hero, you are not the villain, you are nothing but a pawn in schemes that you cannot even begin to understand. Some things are better left secret, kept hidden away from prying eyes.

name: HackRack
summary:
HackRack is a game where you live in a city and use your hacking skills to influence the world around you.
The player will encounter many people and organizations, and their hacks will impact the world around them. The player will need to expand their living space and secret server room to accommodate computing racks, which can be customized to provide the power, traits, and abilities that their viruses require to overcome even the most secure of systems.

name: Hatchpunk
summary: Hatchpunk is a retro first person shooter with unique visual style. You have a gun in one hand and a chainsaw in other hand. So come out and face the hordes of monsters that have invaded Earth. Use grapple hook for efficient movement. Kill enemies in close combat with chainsaw to regain your health.

name: Handball 16
summary:
Play with all your favourite players in THE handball simulation.
Use all the real handball moves and tactics and challenge other players online.

name: Hawk and Puma
summary:
Hawk and Puma is a minimalist game that pays tribute to Guaman Poma, the indigenous chronicler of the Andes. Through a research-creation process, this game reimagines Guaman's journey, exploring themes of racism, sovereignty, and religion from decolonial aesthetics and Andean-inspired music.

This project has been developed in collaboration with members of the ÑawpaÑan community in the Sacred Valley of the Incas in Cusco, Peru, allowing us to create the final version in English, Spanish, and Quechua, and plan upcoming ludic workshops with community youth as part of the ethical research-creation process.

name: Halls of the Dead: Faery Tale Adventure II
Hana Awase New Moon: Himeutsugi
summary: Port of Hana Awase: Himeutsugi for the Switch, simultaneously released in Japanese, Chinese, and English.

name: Hana Awase New Moon: Mizuchi
summary: Port of Hana Awase: Mizuchi for the Switch, simultaneously released in Japanese, Chinese, and English.

name: Half a Minute
summary: Half a Minute is a fun game that you can play with an infinite amount of players (at least 4). Each member of every team describes 5 (words) with in half a minute. The team that has the most knowledge and best tactics wins the game. guaranteed for a fun and hilarious evening!

name: Hanayaka Nari, Waga Ichizoku Tasogare Polar Star
summary: Taking place two months after Kinema Mosaic.

name: Hacker's Adventure
summary: Get ready for a breathtaking platform adventure. Help Super Hacker collect hi-tech products.

name: Haxrail
summary: A fast-paced roguelite shooter in a decaying star system trapped in a time loop. Fight, adapt, and break the cycle... before it breaks you.

name: Hayles Quest
summary: Darkness has engulfed the land, raising the un-dead and other unholy creatures from their very graves. Grasping his sword, Hayle sets out on a quest to vanquish the darkness and restore the light.

name: Hakuoki Shinkai Reimeiroku
summary:
This game takes place before main Hakuoki games, during early days of Shinsengumi. You play as a male character and gather not romance affection points like in the other otome games, but friend affection points with Shinsengumi members.
Included in this version of the game, are all the scenarios that were added as extra content in the past ports of this game.

name: Hang up Street
summary: Build your vocational academy to turn adventurers into your idle heroes, liven up the deserted streets, and advance the levels together!

name: Haruoto Alice: Gram Snow Drop
summary: Seiryou Gakuen is a popular high-ranked school in the seaside city of Minato which prides itself on the latest facilities and student independence. Since a year ago, it has been managed concurrently by the student council and the new entrant's council.

name: Halo Infinite: Operation - Warpath
summary:
UNSC cadets are taught to imitate—and thereby venerate—the martial actions of humanity’s time-honored heroes.
Operation: Warpath ennobles their legend with myth-made armor sets, the epic resurgence of Invasion mode, and a return to hallowed tradition in the Ranked Legacy rotational playlist.
Harken ye to the drums of war. Operation: Warpath sallies forth!

name: Halcyon
summary:
A Unique Action Puzzle Game
Halcyon is named for the mythological bird of ancient Greece, said to charm the winds and seas into a calm during the Winter Solstice.
Gameplay is one part spacial action puzzler and one part interactive stringed instrument combined in an experience designed specifically for the iPad.
Colored currents travel inexorably toward each other. Strum the strings to match the currents, creating both phonic and visual harmony.

Take on the role of the Halcyon, conducting nature, untangling currents, and bringing calm to the wind, sea, land, and stars.

A Generative Musical Instrument
Halcyon features a complete generative soundtrack that becomes an instrument when you play the game. Since its designed to accompany you while you play, you'll create tranquil sonic landscapes as you travel along.

name: Hazuki Makimura's Love Story
summary: Hazuki Makimura's Love Story is the Nintendo Switch port of the 2021 romantic visual novel where after a series of misfortunes, with the protagonist, Kayabuki Akira, being trapped after a tree fell into his apartment and the wall connecting his temporary apartment room to his neighbor's collapses, he's now forced to live with his neighbor, Makimura Hazuki, and deal with living together and getting to know each other better.

name: Hardway Party
summary: Hardway Party is a fast-paced arcade game. Unlock over 50 unique cars and over a dozen worlds. Play with up to 3 of your friends in versus mode or crazy survival mode. If that's not enough, challenge anyone in online multiplayer or show off your skills in 6 differently-themed missions. Let’s get the party rollin’!

name: Harem of Ankhutep
summary:
Harem of Ankhutep is a visual novel set in the sun-drenched streets of Ankhutep, an ancient desert city where daily life unfolds in the shadow of gods, and monstergirls walk the same streets as everyone else as a natural part of everyday life. You, the player, begin your journey by escaping an attack on your homeland, and you arrive in Ankhutep to begin again, not as a warrior or a ruler, but as a humble craftsman.

Here, you’ll share meals, trade stories, and slowly carve out a new life surrounded by friendship, romance, and small, meaningful moments. Yet beneath the city’s warmth lie quiet mysteries, and every bond you form may open the door to ancient secrets waiting just out of sight.

Forge relationships with a diverse cast of monstergirl heroines, each with her own unique personality, ambition, and desire. Your decisions shape your path, unlock unique scenes, and reveal different sides of the story.

name: Halo Wars 2: Commander Jerome Leader Pack
summary:
The Commander Jerome Leader Pack puts you in the role of a Spartan like never before, with units and powers like:
• Commander Jerome as a playable Spartan in a custom Mantis which can fight independently alongside him
• Spartan heroism buffs for friendly units, inspiring your units to new levels of heroism
• The Mastodon APC providing troop transport and mobile garrison capabilities
• A special ability to summon the three additional Spartans of Omega Team

name: Haunt
summary: A little game about the things (or people) you just can't seem to leave behind, no matter how hard you try.

name: Hate You
summary: Welcome to the polar station, where a mysterious timer counts down every hour! Your task is to decipher and input codes on an old terminal, but beware: the polar night holds many secrets. Can you face the horrors that might become reality?

name: Harukanaru Toki no Naka de 6
summary: Harukanaru Toki no Naka de 6 is the sixth installment in the Haruka series. It was one of the surprise announcements during the Neoromance 20th Anniversary stage event, the other being Angelique Retour. It's the first main entry of the series to be available on the PS Vita and to receive a Cero C rating.

name: Haemo
summary:
You will die. Many times.

But each death brings you closer to victory. Each drop of blood makes the next life that tiny bit easier. Collect the blood tanks to permanently boost your blood meter, collect the heart tanks to increase your heart count, solve the riddles to unlock all the secrets, and most importantly — explore!

And when you're nearly drowning in the ocean of blood you've left behind, maybe you will succeed.

name: Harem of Three Thousand
summary: Take on the role of Sophia, a concubine's daughter navigating palace intrigue in this court-themed AVG. Gain imperial favor, uncover conspiracies, manage relationships, forge alliances, train assassins, and raise a prince. Enjoy freedom, multi-route plots, and uncover palace secrets.

name: Hamster Playground: Eating Contest Game Mode
summary: In Eating Contest, strategy meets gluttony as your hamster devours a variety of treats, from crunchy seeds to delicious vegetables and everything in between.

name: Handshakes: Hands On
summary: Handshakes: Hands On is the follow up to Handshakes, the sokoban puzzler about shaking hands. Take your brain for a stroll with all new mechanics, non-linear progression, community level editor and more.

name: Hangul Typing Tale
summary: Learning to type Korean 한글 from ZERO!

name: Hazumi
summary: Hazumi is simple and elegant. To play the game, use only left/right buttons on dpad (or swing circle pad accordingly).

name: Happy Piggy 2
summary: Feed the pigs! The pigs want apples!

name: HackHub
summary: Unravel cyber secrets and foil mass surveillance as a skilled hacker in Hackhub. Challenge authority, rewrite the rules, and emerge as the ultimate digital rebel.

name: HaremRoid VR
summary:
You can interact with up to three characters at once. Create the harem of your dreams!
You can place files in the VRM folder to play with any character that you want, even ones not in the game already!
Animation, expressions, voice work, arrangement — it’s all up to you!

name: Hakurei Frontier Spell Strive
summary:
You can do it on your phone or on your computer!
Touhou characters play cards!

name: Hasegawa Nozomi
summary: Will Nozomi, who lives a dull life, be able to meet Ishigami and have her wish come true? It is a 3D walking simulator game where you explore various places such as the city and classroom and aim for the shrine.

name: Hard Time III
summary: The toughest prison sim in the yard is back to serve its 3rd consecutive sentence - combining classic moments from the OG with the best aspects of 2D, while putting out a few hits of its own! Tackle crime from either side of the prison fence, while a larger world beyond it makes life worth living.

name: Hatsune Miku: Project Diva Dreamy Theater
summary: Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA Dreamy Theater is an enhanced port of the PlayStation Portable game Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA. It was released digitally for the PlayStation 3 on 24 June 2010.

name: Handle With Care..
summary: Our hero was the vocalist of the legendary rock band "Bloody Roses." Presently, his activities with the band are on hold. At one of the live houses he played at, he met an extremely talented vocalist named Sahara Shion. He takes it upon himself to help her in her career... As a player, it is your goal to eventually bring this beautiful talent on stage at the live house "Moon Rouge."

name: Hamster Playground: Hamster City DLC
summary: Hamster City is another DLC pack for Hamster Playground - It's time for the hamsters to experience what real work is, right? Help them by decorating their home in urban style, dressing them up in new costumes reminiscent of urban occupations.

name: Hanayome: The Sacrificial Bride
summary:
You are sent to Kanamura Village, a place full of handsome men, to conduct an interview. Little did you know that at the village famous for its power to grant better luck in romance, you would bear witness to a forbidden ceremony...

How are you supposed to survive a village full of conspiracies and dangerously attractive men!

Love or despair... Will you be able to become the bride of your beloved one!?

name: Hammerwatch II
summary: Gather your heroes and journey beyond the dungeons of Castle Hammerwatch to explore a pixelated world like never before. Aid King Roland’s resistance while helping villagers along the way. Battle beasts, finish off hordes of the undead, and face the forces of evil in this epic ode to classic ARPG.

name: Hardest Game About Jumping
summary: Bounce, struggle, and conquer! Use your pogo stick to launch yourself through brutal, precision-based platforming challenges.

name: Harlequin's Nightmare
summary: "Harlequin's Nightmare" is an action/exploration 2D Platformer, that seeks to emulate classic 2D games. The game tells the story of a kingdom whose King is at risk of being overthrown by an ancient warrior who was loyal to him in the past, but due to his thirst for power was exiled and cursed, and has sworn to take revenge after his exile. The King has put the Kingdom's defense in the hands of the Order of the Green Harlequins, who have faithfully served the Kingdom for centuries.

name: Half-Life: Intolerable Threat
summary: As Gordon Freeman, you must face down the Administrator for the last time. The Administrator has taken control of "HANGAR 16" a government command and control facility in the desert. From here he is possibly planning a coup against the government of the United States, and vengeance against those who have opposed him in the past. You need to meet with an agent who has the access codes to enter the heavily guarded base, infiltrate it and prepare the way for friendly forces to attack.

name: Hajimeow: Tiny Box Cat
summary: Hajimeow: Tiny Box Cat is a cute companion that responds to every keystroke and mouse click by raising signs. With an integrated Pomodoro timer, this little buddy accompanies you through your daily tasks, making work and study sessions more enjoyable and focused.

name: Half-Life: Rally
summary: Half-Life Rally is a racing modification for the highly acclaimed and everlastingly popular game, Half-Life by Valve Software. Unlike most mods currently being made for the Half-Life Engine, the goal of HL-Rally is not to blast your enemy to smitherines with relentless repetition prone to excessive cheating and hacks, but to race cars and be the first and fastest across the finish line, out-running your opponents in any way possible to gain a few milliseconds on them.

name: HAL Protocol
summary: Your shift aboard the HIS 01 Echo is finally over. The return shuttle awaits you in Compartment 9. All that's left is to walk there. But the corridor to Compartment 9 loops endlessly. Each time, something shifts. Uncover the mystery. Escape the impossible.

name: Harvested
summary: You are the caretaker of 'Harvestville' village. One day, darkness covered the village and it was inhabited by entities. You believe that an ancient evil has awakened. To save the village, you need to activate the golden sunflower as soon as possible.

name: Hades' Star: Dark Nebula
summary: Join millions of players in a unique massively multiplayer strategy experience.

name: Haven
summary: A merciless exploration, crafting and survival game for 1-12 players set in a procedurally-generated world overthrown by nature. Embrace the Duality of balancing nature or embracing corruption as you uncover the origin of the plague that claimed the ancient world. Fight, Tame, Farm, Build & SURVIVE!

name: Hatsune Miku: Project Diva Arcade
summary: Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA Arcade is an arcade rhythm game. The game is a port of the 2009 video game, Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA, with updated visuals. The gameplay is relatively the same as the original.
